rule_18.title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources

rule_17_unpublished_forthcoming_sources.title: Unpublished and Forthcoming Sources
rule_17_unpublished_forthcoming_sources.description: Errors in citation of unpublished manuscripts, dissertations, working papers, and forthcoming materials

subrule_errors.error_type: Missing 'on file with' or 'available at' information
subrule_errors.description: Unpublished material must specify where it can be accessed (on file with author, institution, etc.)
subrule_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article Draft (unpublished manuscript, 2020) (on file with author)

subrule_errors.error_type: Missing or vague descriptor for unpublished material type
subrule_errors.description: Must specify the type of unpublished material (manuscript, draft, working paper, etc.)
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Smith, Research Paper (unpublished, 2021) (on file with author)
subrule_errors.correct_example: Jane Smith, Research Paper (unpublished manuscript, 2021) (on file with Columbia Law Library)

subrule_errors.error_type: Unpublished material lacks publication/completion year
subrule_errors.description: All unpublished materials must include the year of creation or last modification
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Article Draft (unpublished manuscript) (on file with author)
subrule_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article Draft (unpublished manuscript, 2020) (on file with author)

subrule_errors.error_type: Forthcoming publication uses wrong date format or placement
subrule_errors.description: Forthcoming sources should use 'forthcoming [year]' or '(forthcoming)' without a year if unknown
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Smith, Book Title (to be published 2021)
subrule_errors.correct_example: Jane Smith, Book Title (forthcoming 2021)

subrule_errors.error_type: Manuscript lacks essential identification components
subrule_errors.description: Manuscripts require author, title, date, and filing location to ensure retrievability
subrule_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Title of Manuscript (unpublished manuscript, 2020) (on file with University Archives)

subrule_errors.error_type: Dissertation citation lacks university name
subrule_errors.description: Dissertations must identify the university where the degree was earned
subrule_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Title (unpublished Ph.D. dissertation, Stanford University, 2020)

subrule_errors.error_type: Improper specification of dissertation type
subrule_errors.description: Must distinguish between Ph.D., LL.M., J.S.D., or other degree types
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Smith, Dissertation Title (unpublished dissertation, Yale University, 2019)
subrule_errors.correct_example: Jane Smith, Dissertation Title (unpublished LL.M. thesis, Yale University, 2019)

subrule_errors.error_type: Dissertation lacks completion year
subrule_errors.description: All dissertations must include the year awarded
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Title (unpublished Ph.D. dissertation, Stanford University)
subrule_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Title (unpublished Ph.D. dissertation, Stanford University, 2020)

subrule_errors.error_type: Letter missing sender, recipient, or date
subrule_errors.description: Letters must identify sender, recipient, and date for proper citation
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: Letter (on file with Columbia Law Review)
subrule_errors.correct_example: Letter from John Doe to Jane Smith (Jan. 5, 2020) (on file with Columbia Law Review)

subrule_errors.error_type: Memo lacks identification or date
subrule_errors.description: Internal memoranda require description, date, and location information
subrule_errors.correct_example: Memorandum from John Doe to Jane Smith (Jan. 5, 2020) (on file with University)

subrule_errors.category: Missing Filing Location for Press Release
subrule_errors.error_type: Press release lacks access information
subrule_errors.description: Press releases require identification and location if not easily retrievable
subrule_errors.correct_example: Organization, Press Release, Title (Jan. 1, 2020) (on file with author)

subrule_errors.error_type: Email missing sender, recipient, or timestamp
subrule_errors.description: Email citations require sender, recipient, date, and time for proper identification
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: Email from John Doe (on file with author)
subrule_errors.correct_example: Email from John Doe to Jane Smith (Jan. 5, 2020, 10:30 AM) (on file with author)

subrule_errors.error_type: Email citation lacks time of transmission
subrule_errors.description: Email citations should include time when date alone is insufficient for retrieval
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: Email from Jane Doe to John Smith (Jan. 5, 2020) (on file with author)
subrule_errors.correct_example: Email from Jane Doe to John Smith (Jan. 5, 2020, 2:45 PM) (on file with author)

subrule_errors.error_type: Listserv or forum post lacks proper identification
subrule_errors.description: Online postings require poster name, platform, date, and either URL or location
subrule_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Message, Law Listserv (Jan. 5, 2020, 3:00 PM) (archived at http://...)

subrule_errors.error_type: Interview missing interviewee, title, or location
subrule_errors.description: Interviews require identification of interviewee, their title/role, location, and date
subrule_errors.correct_example: Interview with John Doe, former Director, ABC Agency, in New York, N.Y. (May 5, 2020)

subrule_errors.error_type: Interview lacks indication of format (in person, telephone, video)
subrule_errors.description: When relevant, interview format should be specified (telephone interview, video conference, etc.)
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: Interview with Jane Smith, Partner, ABC Law Firm (June 1, 2020)
subrule_errors.correct_example: Interview with Jane Smith, Partner, ABC Law Firm (telephone interview, June 1, 2020)

subrule_errors.error_type: Interview lacks reference to recording or transcript if available
subrule_errors.description: If interview transcript or recording exists, citation should reference it
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: Interview with John Doe, Chief Counsel (Jan. 15, 2020) (on file with author)
subrule_errors.correct_example: Interview with John Doe, Chief Counsel (Jan. 15, 2020) (transcript on file with author)

subrule_errors.error_type: Speech missing title, date, or delivery location
subrule_errors.description: Speeches require speaker, title, date, and location information
subrule_errors.correct_example: Remarks of Jane Doe at the Annual Meeting of the XYZ Association (May 1, 2020)

subrule_errors.category: Missing Transcript Status for Unpublished Speech
subrule_errors.error_type: Unpublished speech lacks indication of transcript availability
subrule_errors.description: Unpublished speeches should indicate whether a transcript exists and where it is located
subrule_errors.correct_example: Speech, Location, Date (transcript on file with institution)

subrule_errors.error_type: Forthcoming journal article lacks volume or proper formatting
subrule_errors.description: Forthcoming articles should include volume if available; otherwise use 'forthcoming [year]'
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: Jane Smith, Article Title, Harvard Law Review (forthcoming)
subrule_errors.correct_example: Jane Smith, Article Title, 133 Harv. L. Rev. (forthcoming 2020)

subrule_errors.error_type: Forthcoming book lacks publisher or publication year
subrule_errors.description: Forthcoming books should specify publisher and expected publication year
subrule_errors.correct_example: Jane Smith, Book Title (forthcoming Oxford University Press 2021)

subrule_errors.error_type: Working paper lacks series information or organization
subrule_errors.description: Working papers should specify the organization/series and number if applicable
subrule_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Working Paper Title, Stanford Law and Economics Working Paper No. 123 (2020)

subrule_errors.error_type: SSRN working paper missing URL or abstract number
subrule_errors.description: SSRN citations should include abstract number and optionally the URL
subrule_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Draft Title (Working Paper, 2020), https://ssrn.com/abstract=123456

subrule_errors.category: Missing URL for Online Unpublished Source
subrule_errors.error_type: Online manuscript or working paper lacks URL
subrule_errors.description: Online unpublished sources must include URL for retrieval
subrule_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Draft Title (Apr. 2020) (unpublished manuscript), https://ssrn.com/abstract=123456

subrule_errors.category: Missing Last Visited Date for Dynamic Content
subrule_errors.error_type: Online unpublished source with changing content lacks access date
subrule_errors.description: When URL content is likely to change, 'last visited' date should be included
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Draft Title (unpublished manuscript), https://site.com/draft
subrule_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Draft Title (unpublished manuscript), https://site.com/draft (last visited Jan. 1, 2021)

subrule_errors.error_type: Short cite for unpublished source unclear due to multiple works by author
subrule_errors.description: When author has multiple unpublished citations, short form must distinguish them
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: Doe, supra note 10 (when multiple Doe works cited)
subrule_errors.correct_example: Doe, Draft Article, supra note 10

subrule_errors.category: Improper Use of Id. for Unpublished
subrule_errors.error_type: Using 'Id.' when previous citation includes different unpublished source
subrule_errors.description: Id. cannot be used if prior footnote cites different source or different page of same material
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: Note 1: John Doe, Draft (2020). Note 2: Id. [when citing Jane Smith's work]
subrule_errors.correct_example: Note 1: John Doe, Draft (2020). Note 2: Jane Smith, Research Paper (2020)

rule_18_internet_electronic_media.title: The Internet, Electronic Media, and Other Nonprint Resources
rule_18_internet_electronic_media.description: Errors in citation of websites, databases, multimedia, and other non-print materials

subrule_errors.error_type: Internet source citation lacks URL
subrule_errors.description: All internet sources must include a complete, accessible URL
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: U.S. Census Bureau, Population Estimates (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)
subrule_errors.correct_example: U.S. Census Bureau, Population Estimates, http://www.census.gov/data.html (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)

subrule_errors.error_type: Internet source lacks publication date or last visited date
subrule_errors.description: Internet citations must include either publication date or 'last visited' date
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: U.S. Census Bureau, Population Estimates, http://www.census.gov/data.html
subrule_errors.correct_example: U.S. Census Bureau, Population Estimates, http://www.census.gov/data.html (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)

subrule_errors.error_type: Website citation lacks author or responsible entity identification
subrule_errors.description: Internet sources should identify author or publishing organization when available
subrule_errors.correct_example: U.S. Census Bureau, Population Estimates, http://www.census.gov/data.html (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)

subrule_errors.error_type: Online news article missing URL or access information
subrule_errors.description: Online news articles require title, source, date, and URL (or last visited)
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Article Title, N.Y. Times (Jan. 5, 2021)
subrule_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Article Title, N.Y. Times (Jan. 5, 2021), https://nytimes.com/article

subrule_errors.error_type: Website content lacks descriptive title or page heading
subrule_errors.description: Internet sources must have a clear title; brackets may be used for descriptive titles if not explicit
subrule_errors.correct_example: [Title of Page or Document], Example Website, http://www.example.com/page (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)

subrule_errors.error_type: Descriptive title lacks brackets or clear designation
subrule_errors.description: When using descriptive titles for unclear page names, use brackets [Like This]
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: U.S. Census Bureau, Overview of Census Data, http://www.census.gov
subrule_errors.correct_example: U.S. Census Bureau, [Overview of Census Data], http://www.census.gov (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)

subrule_errors.error_type: Citation unclear about distinction between document title and website name
subrule_errors.description: If document title differs from website name, both should be included with proper formatting
subrule_errors.correct_example: Article Title, Law Site, http://www.lawsite.com/article (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)

subrule_errors.error_type: URL lacks http:// or https:// designation
subrule_errors.description: All URLs must include protocol (http:// or https://)
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: Organization, Page Title, www.example.com/page (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)
subrule_errors.correct_example: Organization, Page Title, https://www.example.com/page (last visited Jan. 1, 2025)

subrule_errors.error_type: URL extremely long and unwieldy; should use shortener
subrule_errors.description: When URL is excessively long, may use URL shortener in brackets (perma.cc, etc.)
subrule_errors.correct_example: Article, Website, https://perma.cc/ABC-XYZ [https://www.example.com/very/long/path]

subrule_errors.error_type: Citation to content likely to move or disappear lacks permalink or archive
subrule_errors.description: For blog posts or changeable content, should cite permalink or archive (perma.cc) version
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: John Doe, Blog Post Title, Law Blog (Jan. 1, 2020), http://lawblog.com/posts/page1
subrule_errors.correct_example: John Doe, Blog Post Title, Law Blog (Jan. 1, 2020), https://perma.cc/ABC-XYZ

subrule_errors.error_type: Citation to Westlaw/Lexis case or statute uses incorrect format
subrule_errors.description: Database citations should use standard neutral citation when available, or proper WL/Lexis format
subrule_errors.correct_example: Case Name, No. 12-CV-3456, 2020 WL 123456 (E.D. Cal. Jan. 5, 2020)

subrule_errors.category: Missing Docket Number in Database Citation
subrule_errors.error_type: Unreported case lacks docket number for identification
subrule_errors.description: Unreported cases from databases should include case/docket number
subrule_errors.correct_example: Case Name, No. 12-CV-3456, 2020 WL 123456 (E.D. Cal. Jan. 5, 2020)

subrule_errors.error_type: Citation improperly specifies database when standard citation exists
subrule_errors.description: Should not cite database name if case is available in standard reporters
subrule_errors.correct_example: Case Name, 123 F.3d 456 (9th Cir. 2020)

subrule_errors.category: Missing Court Designation in Database Citation
subrule_errors.error_type: Database citation lacks parenthetical court and date information
subrule_errors.description: Database citations must include court and decision date in parenthetical
subrule_errors.correct_example: Case Name, 2020 WL 123456 (E.D. Cal. Jan. 5, 2020)

subrule_errors.error_type: CD-ROM citation lacks parenthetical format indicator
subrule_errors.description: CD-ROM and similar media should include format in parenthetical
subrule_errors.correct_example: The Federalist No. 10 (James Madison) (CD-ROM, 1996)

subrule_errors.error_type: CD-ROM citation lacks publisher or release information
subrule_errors.description: CD-ROM citations should include publication/release information and year
subrule_errors.correct_example: Title, Publisher (CD-ROM, 2010)

subrule_errors.error_type: Microfilm/microfiche citation lacks collection identification
subrule_errors.description: Microform collections must be properly identified for retrieval
subrule_errors.correct_example: FBI File No. 123, in FBI Records Collection, microfilm at reel 5 (Nat'l Archives)

subrule_errors.error_type: Microform citation lacks specific location (reel, frame, or section)
subrule_errors.description: Microform citations require reel, frame, or box numbers for precise retrieval
subrule_errors.correct_example: Document Title, NY Times Microfilm Collection, reel 12 (Pub. Library)

subrule_errors.error_type: Original material on microform lacks collection info or frame reference
subrule_errors.description: Original materials published only on microform need collection name, location, and frame/page
subrule_errors.correct_example: John Doe Papers, microfiche at frame 123 (Stanford University Archives)

subrule_errors.error_type: Film citation lacks director information
subrule_errors.description: Films should be cited with director and production company
subrule_errors.correct_example: The Social Network (Columbia Pictures 2010)

subrule_errors.error_type: Film or broadcast title not italicized
subrule_errors.description: Film titles must be italicized
subrule_errors.correct_example: The Social Network (Columbia Pictures 2010)

subrule_errors.error_type: TV episode citation lacks episode title, series title, or air date
subrule_errors.description: Television episodes require episode title, series name, network, and air date
subrule_errors.correct_example: "Episode Title," Series Name (Network Jan. 15, 2020)

subrule_errors.error_type: Radio or TV broadcast citation missing network, segment title, or date
subrule_errors.description: Broadcasts require segment title, network, and date information
subrule_errors.correct_example: News Report Segment, NPR (Jan. 15, 2020)

subrule_errors.error_type: YouTube or online video citation missing creator, platform, or URL
subrule_errors.description: Online videos require creator/poster, title, platform, date, and URL
subrule_errors.correct_example: Creator Name, Video Title, YouTube (Jan. 1, 2020), https://youtube.com/watch?v=...

subrule_errors.category: Missing Album Title in Music Citation
subrule_errors.error_type: Musical recording citation lacks album/album title
subrule_errors.description: Music citations require artist, song title, album, label, and year
subrule_errors.correct_example: Artist, "Song Title," on Album Title (Record Label 2020)

subrule_errors.error_type: Classical music citation missing performer, label, or year
subrule_errors.description: Classical music requires composer, title, performer, label, and year
subrule_errors.correct_example: Composer, Title (Performer/Orchestra, Record Label 2020)

subrule_errors.error_type: Unpublished audio recording lacks identification or location
subrule_errors.description: Noncommercial recordings need description, date, and location (on file with...)
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: Interview with John Doe (on file with author)
subrule_errors.correct_example: Interview with John Doe, Partner, ABC Law Firm (audio recording on file with author, Jan. 5, 2020)

subrule_errors.error_type: Oral argument recording lacks case name, court, docket number, or timestamp
subrule_errors.description: Oral argument citations need case info, court, number, date, and time if referenced
subrule_errors.correct_example: Oral Argument at 5:32, Doe v. Smith, No. 123 (9th Cir. Jan. 1, 2020) (audio recording)

subrule_errors.error_type: Podcast citation missing episode title, show name, or date
subrule_errors.description: Podcasts require host/creator, episode title, podcast name, date, and optionally URL
subrule_errors.correct_example: Host Name, Episode Title, Podcast Name (Jan. 1, 2020)

subrule_errors.error_type: Podcast citation lacks platform or website information
subrule_errors.description: If podcast platform is relevant or helpful for retrieval, it may be included
subrule_errors.correct_example: Host, Episode Title, Podcast Name, Spotify (Jan. 1, 2020)

subrule_errors.error_type: Podcast transcript citation lacks URL or transcript reference
subrule_errors.description: When citing podcast transcript, should reference transcript source or URL
subrule_errors.correct_example: Host, Episode Title, Podcast (Jan. 1, 2020), https://site.com/transcript (transcript)

subrule_errors.error_type: Photograph citation missing photographer, subject, date, or source
subrule_errors.description: Photographs require photographer, subject, date, and source/availability information
subrule_errors.correct_example: John Smith, Photograph of [Subject] (2019), available at https://...

subrule_errors.error_type: Illustration in book lacks proper citation or page reference
subrule_errors.description: Illustrations should be cited via book citation with figure/page reference
subrule_errors.correct_example: Figure 1, in Title of Book 45 (Publisher 2020)

subrule_errors.error_type: Image or diagram lacks photographer or source credit
subrule_errors.description: Images should include photographer or source attribution if available
subrule_errors.correct_example: Photo by John Smith, available at URL

subrule_errors.error_type: Short cite to internet source unclear due to unusual title
subrule_errors.description: Internet sources with non-standard names may need hereinafter for clarity
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: supra note 10 (when note 10 has complex URL-based citation)
subrule_errors.correct_example: Shortened name hereinafter set in initial citation; then use shortened name, supra

subrule_errors.category: Improper Supra Reference for Statutes from Database
subrule_errors.error_type: Short cite uses 'supra' for statute or case found in database
subrule_errors.description: Short citations to statutes/cases should use proper abbreviations, not 'supra'
subrule_errors.correct_example: Statute provision [proper abbreviation], supra note 5

subrule_errors.error_type: Long, complex citation lacks hereinafter abbreviation
subrule_errors.description: For complex internet citations, establish hereinafter abbreviation on first use
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: Author, Very Long Complex Title with Many Words, Complex Website Name, https://example.com/very/long/path (last visited...). [Subsequent cites: Author, supra]
subrule_errors.correct_example: Author, Very Long Complex Title with Many Words, Complex Website Name, https://example.com/very/long/path (last visited...) [hereinafter "ABBREVIATED TITLE"]. [Subsequent cites: ABBREVIATED TITLE, supra]

rule_19_services.title: Services
rule_19_services.description: Errors in citation of looseleaf services, electronic services, and compilations of law

subrule_errors.error_type: Service citation lacks pinpoint paragraph or section
subrule_errors.description: Service citations require specific paragraph or section number for precise identification
subrule_errors.correct_example: 5 CCH Cons. Fin. Guide ¶ 72,205 (2019)

subrule_errors.error_type: Service name lacks proper abbreviation or abbreviation is incorrect
subrule_errors.description: Service citations should use standard abbreviations (CCH, RIA, etc.)
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: 5 Commerce Clearing House Consumer Finance Guide ¶ 72,205 (2019)
subrule_errors.correct_example: 5 CCH Cons. Fin. Guide ¶ 72,205 (2019)

subrule_errors.error_type: Multi-volume service citation lacks volume designation
subrule_errors.description: Services with multiple volumes must include the volume number
subrule_errors.correct_example: 5 CCH Cons. Fin. Guide ¶ 72,205 (2019)

subrule_errors.error_type: Unclear whether citation uses section (§) or paragraph (¶) format
subrule_errors.description: Must use correct symbol: ¶ for paragraph numbers, § for section numbers
subrule_errors.correct_example: 5 CCH Cons. Fin. Guide ¶ 72,205 (2019)

subrule_errors.error_type: Service citation lacks year or release date
subrule_errors.description: Service citations should include the year or edition referenced
subrule_errors.correct_example: 5 CCH Cons. Fin. Guide ¶ 72,205 (2019)

subrule_errors.error_type: Electronic service citation lacks proper database identifier
subrule_errors.description: When citing service via Westlaw/Lexis, may note database if helpful
subrule_errors.correct_example: 5 CCH Cons. Fin. Guide ¶ 72,205 (Westlaw 2019) or 5 CCH Cons. Fin. Guide ¶ 72,205 (2019) [if in print]

subrule_errors.error_type: Service organized by release number lacks proper citation format
subrule_errors.description: If service uses release numbers instead of volumes, format as appropriate for that service
subrule_errors.correct_example: 5 Tax Service ¶ 72,205, release 10 (2019) or [service-specific format]

subrule_errors.error_type: Service citation may need publisher specification for clarity
subrule_errors.description: Some services benefit from including publisher if name is ambiguous
subrule_errors.correct_example: 5 CCH Cons. Fin. Guide ¶ 72,205 (2019)

subrule_errors.error_type: Short citation lacks full service name when multiple services cited
subrule_errors.description: Short cite must be clear; if multiple services, may need fuller identification
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: Guide, supra note 10, ¶ 72,205 (when multiple guide services cited)
subrule_errors.correct_example: CCH Cons. Fin. Guide, supra note 10, ¶ 72,205

subrule_errors.category: Incorrect Paragraph Reference in Short Cite
subrule_errors.error_type: Short cite includes outdated paragraph number due to service update
subrule_errors.description: When using 'supra' for services, verify paragraph number hasn't changed in updates
subrule_errors.incorrect_example: CCH Cons. Fin. Guide, supra note 10, ¶ 72,100 (when original citation had ¶ 72,205)
subrule_errors.correct_example: CCH Cons. Fin. Guide, supra note 10, ¶ 72,205

subrule_errors.category: Improper Use of Id. for Services
subrule_errors.error_type: Using 'Id.' when previous service citation was different or different paragraph
subrule_errors.description: Id. cannot be used if prior citation is to different service or different paragraph
subrule_errors.correct_example: Note 1: 5 CCH Guide ¶ 100 (2019). Note 2: 5 CCH Guide, supra note 1, ¶ 200
